system.description: You become one with nature and attain knowledge of the surrounding territory. In the outdoors, the spell gives you knowledge of the land within 3 miles of the site; in natural underground settings it gives knowledge of the surrounding 1 mile. The spell does not function in constructed settings. You instantly gain knowledge of up to three facts from among the following: terrain and bodies of water; prevalent plants, animals, or intelligent creatures; general mineral content of the ground; powerful unnatural creatures; influence of other planes; buildings. For each additional 3 caster levels above 9th, you may learn one additional fact.
